meanings.sent1: The doctor was carbolizing the wound to prevent infection.
meanings.sent2: She carbolized the surgical instruments before the operation.
meanings.sent3: The bacteria were surprised to see the wound carbolized.
meanings.sent4: His words were like carbolizing truth into her heart.
meanings.sent5: The smell of carbolizing filled the room, overpowering all other scents.

meanings.definition: Subject (something) to the process of carbolization.
meanings.sent1: The scientist was carbolizing the sample for analysis.
meanings.sent2: They carbolized the wood to make it more durable.
meanings.sent3: The cake was accidentally carbolized in the oven, creating a unique flavor.
meanings.sent4: Her mind felt like it was carbolizing under the pressure of the exam.
meanings.sent5: The process of carbolizing the metal made it resistant to rust.
